Description
AbstractContext
 
AbstractContextFactory
 
Actor
Class that represents an actor.
ActorContext
Class that contains the actors, based on the singleton pattern
ActorContextTest
Class used to test the ActorContext class.
ActorListener
 
ActorProxy
Class that represents an Actor Proxy, which controls the access to the actor Send Receive Offer
ActorTest
Class used to test the Actor class
AddInsultMessage
Message used to add a new message to the insult list
AuxProxy
Class used as an auxiliary proxy to send messages back to the proxy
DynamicProxy
Class used to intercept calls to an interface and convert them into messages
DynamicProxyTest
 
EncryptionDecorator
Class used to encrypt messages sent to an actor.
EncryptionTest
Class used to test the encryption decorator
FirewallDecorator
Class used to filter the messages processed by an actor
FirewallDecoratorTest
 
GetAllInsultsMessage
 
GetInsultMessage
Class used later on on a pattern matching as a getter for the insult message
HelloWorldActor
Class used to test the actor inheritance and the return of messages to proxies
HelloWorldTest
Class used to test the HelloWorld actor
ImplCifradoCesar
Interface used to define the methods that an EncryptionDecorator must implement
InsultActor
Class that represents an Insult Actor.
InsultActorTest
Class used to test the InsultActor class.
InsultService
Interface used to create a dynamic proxy for the actor
InsultServiceImpl
Class used to implement the InsultService interface.
LambdaFirewallDecorator
Class that represents a decorator that filters the messages.
Main
Class that represents the main program.
Message
Class that represents a message to be sent to an actor.

Observer
 
PlatformContext
Platform Context class used to spawn Actors with platform Threads
PlatformContextFactory
 
QuitMessage
Class used to stop an actor from receiving messages
RingActor
Class that will test the actor functioning.
RingActorTest
 
Status
Enum used to define the different status of an actor.
Traffic
 
VirtualContext
Class used to create an ActorContext using Virtual Threads

Class used for creating a Virtual Context using the Factory Pattern
